name: Chemistry Final Project: START-UP
description:
Chemistry Final Project: START-UP

The interactive game is our submitted output for the final project in Chemistry 2. This game will introduce and explain the concept of the effect on freezing point when a substance is dissolved in water. We aim to relate this topic to a real-life situation and present in our most creative way.

This game only works in desktop.

By: Jemellie Arevalo, Eanah Baroy, & Eos Formes
